name: DISCORD__GET_CURRENT_USER
description: Get a user object for the current user.

name: DISCORD__SEND_MESSAGE
description: Send a message to a Discord channel with text, embeds, and file attachments.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to send message to

name: DISCORD__GET_CHANNEL_MESSAGES
description: Retrieve messages from a Discord channel with filtering and pagination options.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to get messages from

before.description: Get messages before this message ID

after.description: Get messages after this message ID

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_CHANNELS
description: Get a list of all channels in a Discord server with their types and permissions.

name: DISCORD__CREATE_CHANNEL
description: Create a new channel in a Discord server with specified name, type, and permissions.

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_MEMBERS
description: Get a list of guild members with their roles and user information.

after.description: Get members after this user ID

name: DISCORD__ADD_GUILD_MEMBER_ROLE
description: Add a role to a guild member in Discord server.

user_id.description: User ID to add role to

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_ROLES
description: Get all roles in a Discord server with their permissions and member counts.

name: DISCORD__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a webhook for a Discord channel to send automated messages.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to create webhook for

name: DISCORD__DELETE_MESSAGE
description: Delete a message from a Discord channel by message ID.

name: DISCORD__EDIT_MESSAGE
description: Edit an existing message in a Discord channel with new content or embeds.

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_INFO
description: Retrieve detailed information about a Discord server including name, member count, and settings.

with_counts.description: Include approximate member and presence counts

name: DISCORD__CREATE_ROLE
description: Create a new role in a Discord server with specified permissions and appearance settings.

hoist.description: Whether role should be displayed separately in member list

name: DISCORD__UPDATE_ROLE
description: Update an existing role in a Discord server with new permissions, name, or appearance settings.

permissions.description: Updated bitwise value of enabled/disabled permissions

hoist.description: Whether role should be displayed separately in member list

name: DISCORD__DELETE_ROLE
description: Delete a role from a Discord server permanently, removing it from all members.

name: DISCORD__REMOVE_GUILD_MEMBER_ROLE
description: Remove a role from a guild member in Discord server, revoking associated permissions.

user_id.description: User ID to remove role from

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_MEMBER
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific guild member including roles and join date.

user_id.description: User ID to get member info for

name: DISCORD__UPDATE_GUILD_MEMBER
description: Update a guild member in Discord server with new nickname, roles, or moderation settings.

roles.description: Array of role IDs to assign to the member

mute.description: Whether the member is muted in voice channels

deaf.description: Whether the member is deafened in voice channels

channel_id.description: Voice channel ID to move member to

name: DISCORD__KICK_GUILD_MEMBER
description: Remove (kick) a member from a Discord server, allowing them to rejoin with invite link.

user_id.description: User ID to kick from server

name: DISCORD__BAN_GUILD_MEMBER
description: Ban a member from a Discord server, preventing them from rejoining and optionally deleting their messages.

user_id.description: User ID to ban from server

delete_message_days.description: Number of days of messages to delete (0-7)

reason.description: Reason for the ban (for audit log)

name: DISCORD__UNBAN_GUILD_MEMBER
description: Unban a previously banned user from a Discord server, allowing them to rejoin.

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_BANS
description: Retrieve all banned users from a Discord server with ban reasons and timestamps.

before.description: Get bans before this user ID

after.description: Get bans after this user ID

name: DISCORD__UPDATE_CHANNEL
description: Update a Discord channel with new name, topic, permissions, or other settings.

nsfw.description: Whether the channel is marked as NSFW

position.description: Updated sorting position of the channel

name: DISCORD__DELETE_CHANNEL
description: Delete a channel from a Discord server permanently, removing all messages and history.

name: DISCORD__GET_CHANNEL_INFO
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Discord channel including permissions and settings.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to get information for

name: DISCORD__ADD_REACTION
description: Add an emoji reaction to a message in a Discord channel for engagement and feedback.

name: DISCORD__REMOVE_REACTION
description: Remove an emoji reaction from a message in a Discord channel.

message_id.description: Message ID to remove reaction from

name: DISCORD__PIN_MESSAGE
description: Pin a message in a Discord channel to make it easily accessible to all members.

name: DISCORD__UNPIN_MESSAGE
description: Unpin a message from a Discord channel, removing it from the pinned messages list.

name: DISCORD__GET_PINNED_MESSAGES
description: Retrieve all pinned messages from a Discord channel for quick access to important information.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to get pinned messages from

name: DISCORD__CREATE_GUILD_INVITE
description: Create an invite link for a Discord server with customizable expiration and usage limits.

channel_id.description: Channel ID to create invite for

max_age.description: Duration of invite in seconds (0 = never expire)

temporary.description: Whether this invite only grants temporary membership

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_INVITES
description: Retrieve all active invites for a Discord server with usage statistics and expiration info.

name: DISCORD__DELETE_INVITE
description: Delete an invite from a Discord server, making the invite link invalid.

name: DISCORD__GET_GUILD_EMOJIS
description: Retrieve all custom emojis from a Discord server for use in messages and reactions.

name: DISCORD__CREATE_GUILD_EMOJI
description: Create a new custom emoji in a Discord server for use in messages and reactions.

image.description: Base64 encoded image data for the emoji

roles.description: Array of role IDs that can use this emoji (empty for everyone)

name: DISCORD__DELETE_GUILD_EMOJI
description: Delete a custom emoji from a Discord server permanently.

name: DISCORD__GET_CURRENT_USER_GUILDS
description: Retrieve all Discord servers that the current user is a member of with basic information.

before.description: Get guilds before this guild ID

after.description: Get guilds after this guild ID

with_counts.description: Include approximate member and presence counts

name: DISCORD__SEND_DM
description: Send a direct message to a Discord user privately outside of server channels.

recipient_id.description: User ID to send DM to

name: DISCORD__GET_AUDIT_LOG
description: Retrieve audit log entries from a Discord server to track administrative actions and changes.

user_id.description: Filter by user who made the changes

action_type.description: Filter by audit log action type

before.description: Get entries before this entry ID

limit.description: Number of audit log entries to return
